hero.title: Decide what to <1>play</1> with your friends!
hero.paragraph: Create or join a <1>Steamder</1> room, and choose the game you are passionate about! With the magic of <1>SteamWGP</1>, you will come to an agreement on the choice of game much more efficiently!

1.title: No more endless debates
1.subtitle: <1>SteamWGP</1> is here to settle the debate! No more lengthy discussions with your friends on Discord to decide which game you're going to play!

2.title: You don't have to do anything!
2.subtitle: <1>SteamWGP</1> takes care of syncing your Steam game library! No need to spend 5 hours looking for your games and adding them manually!

3.title: Make friends!
3.subtitle: Join public rooms (also called <1>Steamder</1>) to meet other players to have a good time with!

howto.title: How does it work?
howto.subtitle: Using <1>SteamWGP</1> is a breeze and accessible to all! Just follow these simple steps to swiftly decide on the perfect game for a fantastic gaming session with your pals!

1.title: 1. Log in
1.subtitle: No need to sign up, simply log in with your Steam account through <2>this link</2>, and your library will be synchronized with <1>SteamWGP</1>! Of course, only multiplayer games will be automatically added to your <1>SteamWGP</1> library!

2.title: 2. Create or join a Steamder
2.subtitle:
None of your friends created a <1>Steamder</1>? Create one!
Your friend wants to invite you to their <1>Steamder</1>? They share the link with you, you access it, and congratulations!

3.title: 3. Let's roll, team!
3.subtitle: The <1>Steamder</1> admin has kicked off the session! Just pick your favorites from the list, and the first game to get unanimous votes from all <1>Steamder</1> members wins the selection!

4.title: 4. Let's play!
4.subtitle: And just like that, you've quickly agreed on the perfect multiplayer game to enjoy without any fuss!
